titles.title: MP951,SF530 To Be In Your Presence

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v1 c1 v2 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To be in Your presence
To sit at your feet
Where your love surrounds me
And makes me complete

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To rest in your presence
Not rushing away
To cherish each moment
Here I would stay

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
This is my desire, oh Lord
This is my desire
This is my desire, oh Lord
This is my desire.
